name: slackLists.items.create
desc: Add a new item to an existing List.

duplicated_item_id.desc: ID of the record to make a copy of.

list_id.desc: ID of the List to add the item to.

parent_item_id.desc: ID of the parent record for this subtask.

errors.over_row_maximum: Cannot create more items over the maximum.
errors.duplicated_item_not_found: The item to duplicate cannot be found.
errors.invalid_option_id: Option ID provided does not match column definition.
errors.uneditable_column: Initial values provided for an uneditable column.
errors.invalid_input_type: The field value type does not match the column type.
errors.invalid_column_id: The column ID provided does not exist in the List.
errors.over_cell_fields_limit: Too many values provided for a single field.
errors.file_not_found: The attachment file could not be found.
errors.invalid_vote_value: Invalid value provided for a vote column.
